document_notes.text:
This update for gd fixes one issues.

This security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2017-6362: Prevent double-free in gdImagePngPtr() that potentially allowed for DoS or remote code execution (bsc#1056993).

notes.text: Double free vulnerability in the gdImagePngPtr function in libgd2 before 2.2.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via vectors related to a palette with no colors.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
